original_text: So Jesus went with them. When he was not very far away from the house, the officer sent some friends to talk to him. He told them to say to Jesus, ‘Sir, I do not want to be a trouble to you. I am not good enough for you to come into my house.
korean_text: 예수께서 함께 가실새 이에 그 집이 멀지 아니하여 백부장이 벗들을 보내어 이르되 주여 수고하시지 마옵소서 내 집에 들어오심을 나는 감당하지 못하겠나이다

sentences.original_text: When he was not very far away from the house,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 집에서 그리 멀지 않았을 때,

sentences.original_text: the officer sent some friends to talk to him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 장교는 그와 이야기하기 위해 친구들을 보냈습니다.

sentences.original_text: He told them to say to Jesus,
‘Sir, I do not want to be a trouble to you.
sentences.korean_translation: '주님, 나는 당신에게 폐를 끼치고 싶지 않습니다.

sentences.original_text: I am not good enough for you to come into my house.
sentences.korean_translation: 저는 당신이 저의 집에 들어오실 자격이 충분하지 않습니다.'
